title: As a user I do not want be allowed to request trd waivers on a player that has had a request withdrawn in the past 30 days
custom_steps:
Error Messages:
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2329288

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a request for Trade assignment waivers is withdrawn on any player, Trade waivers may not be requested by the same Club until 30 days after the withdrawal date of such waiver request.
* On Submit of the waiver request, display error #51.

title: Remove Optional Waiver Request code
custom_steps:
*Follow up to story #135480817 to remove the code associated with OPT waiver requests as needed*

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Any unnecessary OPT waiver code is removed (dev decision how best to do this). 
* TRD, UR and OR waivers continue to work as originally designed. 
* Waiver expiration batch should also continue to work after the removal of the OPT code.

title: As a user I no longer want to see "Optional Waivers" in the "In Effect" section of player's profile
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "In Effect" portion of the Waivers/Trans tab of the pro player profile should no longer include the "Optional Assignment Waivers" row. 
* OPT waiver requests should continue to display in the waiver history table.

title: As a user I no longer want to see the Opt Waivers Required column in the MJ Roster widget
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Wvs Req to Opt" column should no longer display for any user in the MJ Roster widget.

title: As a user I no longer want to see the Optional Waivers Required date on the player profile
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Waivers Required as of" field on the Waivers/Trans tab of the pro player profile should no longer display.

title: As a user I want to approving a Place on 10-day DL to cancel a player's waivers
custom_steps:
See Approval Update #2.19: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the player has a current pending waiver request or if the player has secured waivers and the entered Injury Date is on or before the Secured date, then the waivers are cancelled on approval of the transaction. 
* Cancelled date and the Cancellation reason should be updated on the player profile.
* Cancellation reason on the profile should be set to -  "Cancelled by DL Placement"
* The waiver request result is updated to "Cancelled on <date>"

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I'm attempting to place on the 10-Day DL has a submitted waiver request
custom_steps:
See Business Rule #1.01: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2308669

See Error Message #1: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning handling) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the player has a current submitted waiver request, display a hard error on submit/approve:
â€œPlayer with a submitted waiver request may not be assigned. The waiver request should be deleted before re-submitting the assignment.â€￾
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 10-Day DL has previously secured waivers
custom_steps:
See Business Rule #1.02: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2308669

See Error Message #2: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the player has secured waivers and the entered Injury Date is on or before the Secured date, then display an overrideable warning on submit/approve:
â€œPreviously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement.â€￾
* {0} to be replaced with the waiver type.
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 10-Day DL has any pending waiver requests
custom_steps:
See Business Rule #1.03: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2308669

See Error Message #3: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning handling) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the player has a current pending waiver request, display an overrideable warning on submit/approve: 
â€œPlayer has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement.â€￾
* {0} to be replaced with the waiver type.
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a BOC user I want to see flags on a MJ 10-Day DL if certain rule checks fail
custom_steps:
Business Value: 
BOC users want to be warned if certain rule checks have failed. They should see these flags on the Approvals clipboard as well as on the form itself. 

See Flags #23.01, #23.02, #23.05: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309213

Acceptance Criteria:
* BOC Approvers see Flags on a submitted transaction only if there is one or more flags set for the form. 
* Clicking on the flags icon opens a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form. (global functionality and styling)
* Flags display on the Approvals item if it is present.
* 23.01 - If this assignment will result in the player's previously secured waivers being cancelled, then the flag "Player's secured waivers will be cancelled with the approval of this transaction." appears.
* 23.02 - If this assignment will result in the player's pending waiver request(s) to be cancelled, then the flag "Player's pending waiver requests will be cancelled with the approval of this transaction" appears.
* 23.05 If the player's Injury Date matches the Claim Expire Date or the Withdrawal Date of a waiver, then the flag "Player's Waiver may need to be cancelled with the approval of this transaction. " appears.
